pkgmetadata.longdescription: The autoimp module makes usage of the interactive Python prompt more productive. With autoimp, all installed Python modules can be imported with the single statement "from autoimp import *". The imported modules are proxy objects which lazily load when first used. Install with 'sudo pip install autoimp'. Proper installation of autoimp involves placing "from autoimp import *" in your PYTHONSTARTUP file. Once autoimp is properly installed, it is no longer necessary to use statements of the form "import X" at the interactive prompt.
